statements: DELETE FROM waste_management_practices WHERE recycling_efforts = true;
DELETE FROM waste_management_practices WHERE recycling_efforts = TRUE;
DELETE FROM waste_categories WHERE category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM waste_management_practices WHERE recycling_level >= 3);
DELETE FROM waste_collection_points WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM waste_collection_points WHERE city = 'New York' AND capacity < 1000;
DELETE FROM waste_management_sites WHERE site_name = 'City Park';
DELETE FROM recycling_statistics WHERE site_id = 3 AND year = 2022;
